author: GameSpot
description:
Watch the full video here: https://youtu.be/iMf2YEOuRKI

Romeo Is A Deadman is Grasshopper Manufacture latest action game created by Suda 51 and Ren Yamazaki. It’s an all new IP from the developer, and it feels like Grasshopper is firing on all cylinders. Kurt Indovina got hands-on with the game, and got to fight through zombies, monsters, and a giant naked headless woman (which he was a big fan of).
title: Romeo Is A Dead Man Hands-on - Our Biggest Takeaways #romeoisadeadman

author: GameSpot
description:
The next evolution of the award-winning skate™ franchise is releasing in Early Access September 16th. 

Experience improved Flick-It controls, the rich physics based skateboarding gameplay that provides those “only in skate.™“ moments and off-board exploration for full freedom in the online multiplayer world of San Vansterdam.

Your new favorite hangout awaits. 

Play for free starting on September 16 on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation® 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via EA App, Epic Games Store and Steam.
title: skate. | Early Access Release Date Reveal Trailer

author: GameSpot
description: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2's upcoming DLC, Legacy of the Forge, sees Henry running his forge. Kurt Indovina got hands-on with the DLC at Gamescom 2025 for 30 minutes, and in that time, he saw a glimpse of what it's like to manage a forge, as well as a taste of its new mainline quest and side quests. Legacy of the Forge will offer 15-20 hours of more gameplay and story, according to developer Warhorse Studios.
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2's DLC Let's You Be A Dentist By Punching A Guy's Tooth Out

author: GameSpot
description:
Today we played the new Kingdom Come DLC, Legacy of the Forge. While the title suggests that you will do a lot of blacksmithing, you actually manage a forge most of the time, and can punch a guy's tooth out.

#legacyoftheforge #kingdomcomedeliverance2
title: Kingdom Come Deliverance II: Legacy of the Forge DLC - Hands-on Impressions

title: The Best Games of Gamescom 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Clive Barker's Hellraiser: Revival isn't only an amazing adaptation for iconic horror movie franchise, but also a new and ambitious survival horror. Kurt Indovina got hands-on for 40 minutes with Hellrasier: Revival during Gamescom 2025, and it quickly became one of his most anticipated games. It's a single player narrative driven survival horror, that'll send you through the labyrinth of Hellrasier, while you run from the Cenobites, while harnessing the magical powers of cube, while relying on tense melee combat and guns to fend of monsters and humans. Oh, and it's definitely not for the squeamish. 

#gamespot #gaming #hellraisergame
title: Hellraiser: Revival Will Push The Rating System To Its Absolute Limits

author: GameSpot
description:
Cliver Barker's Hellraiser Revival gave us 4 big takeaways. The game feels like Condemned and Resident Evil Village combined, and the production value of this Hellraiser game is fantastic thanks to the Unreal 5 engine.

#gamespot #gaming #hellraiser
title: Clive Barker's Hellraiser Revival Hands-on #hellraiserthegame
